overview: Featuring the soothing musical sounds of RichArt, this therapeutic video will help harness your natural energy and foster health, healing, balance and a feeling of harmony as the built-up tensions of the day melt away. At the same time, you'll tap your innate resources in a way that will get you in tune with your whole body. Clarity, focus and a sense of inner peace are just minutes away, thanks to this relaxing video.
title: Nature States - Deep Relaxation
